content: ItaCaFest is an online webinar aimed to gather the community of Italian category theorists. Here's the main page of the event https://progetto-itaca.github.io/pages/fest.html

You are welcome to attend the seminar, even if you are not Italian. For the moment, we have TeXed a fantastic poster of the conference https://progetto-itaca.github.io/pages/a3poster.pdf

Join us, print the poster, frame it on your wall!
https://progetto-itaca.github.io/pages/fest.html#fest2 ItaCa fest II is coming. July 16, 14.00 CEST. BYOB (bring your own bicategory)!
